title: Manage Tour Bus Parking
description: The production manager for a touring show needs to arrange parking for three tour buses and two equipment trucks.

tasks.description: Receive the vehicle parking request from the tour manager.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the number and type of vehicles.

tasks.description: Check the venue's loading dock and bus parking schedule to ensure there is space.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms there is adequate space for the vehicles.

tasks.description: Reserve the required parking spots and arrange for any necessary shore power hookups.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reserves the spots and creates a work order for the electricians.

tasks.description: Send a parking map and instructions to the tour manager.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear directions for the drivers.
